search_input: Domains in this context are the fields of information between which the projections take place, as well as those that establish said projections. In the architectural communication, domains could be understood as the ichnographic, orthographic and scenographic drawings. Here, given the focus on images and text, these will form the primary domains, with the third being a collection of documents that inherently contains both.
suggested_query: These domains will be interconnected through the use of specific metadata, which will allow for the retrieval and manipulation of the information stored within them. This metadata will be structured using a controlled vocabulary, ensuring the consistency and reusability of the data. The domains will also be linked to specific workflows, enabling the automation of certain tasks and facilitating the collaboration among team members.
suggest_context: 3.2 DOMAINS Domains in this context are the fields of information between which the projections take place, as well as those that establish said projections. In the architectural communication, domains could be understood as the ichnographic, orthographic and scenographic drawings. Here, given the focus on images and text, these will form the primary domains, with the third being a collection of documents that inherently contains both.
